document_data.mainbody:
Teshlang was an agent of Zhentarim who operated in Daggerford in .
In 1372 DR, during Zhentarims plot to covertly take over the city of Daggerford via a puppet ruler, Teshlangs cell operated out of the citys sewers. The Black Network cell Teshlang was a part of established a secret route to finance and equip an army of orcs and even made a deal with a devil, the ancient enemy of Daggerford. The sewer cell was eventually discovered by the Hero of Daggerford. All members, apart from Teshlang, who was absent at the time, were slain.
